channel.title: CVE Feed for clastix -- capsule-proxy
channel.description: The latest CVEs for clastix -- capsule-proxy

item.title: CVE-2022-23652|2024-08-03T03:51:45.543Z -- clastix -- capsule-proxy
item.description: capsule-proxy is a reverse proxy for Capsule Operator which provides multi-tenancy in Kubernetes. In versions prior to 0.2.1 an attacker with a proper authentication mechanism may use a malicious `Connection` header to start a privilege escalation attack towards the Kubernetes API Server. This vulnerability allows for an exploit of the `cluster-admin` Role bound to `capsule-proxy`. There are no known workarounds for this issue.
